text: Fhe Bakɨme nduara na suaŋgim, gu ndav Zerusareman kav, gu maam guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi gari gumgi panira garav, gu mbera phorga nzuai. Gu mbe phorga nzuav, gu mba harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi phorga suaŋgi buna vhuueŋra, gu nera mbe nzuai. Gu khueŋ ndɨkndɨgap, gu muuŋv kɨrim, gu khar mbui ŋaar gum gu fhum muuŋgi ŋaari, nta fhura mbar ŋgɨgɨrivgi.
